thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com
thread.title: Michael DiBona
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Michael DiBona

author: Michael DiBona
title: Michael DiBona
text:
I have nothing but positive things so say about Right Channel Radios. They have a wide selection of products, their website is very informative, instruction manuals are clear and many troubleshooting guides are available.
All that being said nothing beats their customer service. I ordered a radio from that, which I found out was defective once tried to use it. I called Right Channel Radios, talked to Pat and they had a new radio sent to me that same day.
It was a pleasure purchasing my first CB radio kit from Right Channel Radios and I plan on doing more business with them in the future.
